The Three Key Roles in SWPPP Creation

The Three Key Roles

Andy → The one who knows the rules (Product Owner).

Jackie → The one who builds the tool (Developer).

Sophia → The one who uses the tool (End User).

The Whole Story in One Line

Andy → makes the “document skeleton.”

Jackie → makes it work in the system.

Sophia → fills in the blanks and gets the final SWPPP.
